# iosxr_router_isis_interface (Data Source)

This data source can read the Router ISIS Interface configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_router_isis_interface" "example" {
  process_id     = "P1"
  interface_name = "GigabitEthernet0/0/0/1"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `interface_name` (String) Interface to configure
- `process_id` (String) Process ID

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `affinity_flex_algos` (List of String) Affinity names
- `affinity_flex_algos_anomalies` (List of String) Affinities to advertise when there is a link anomaly
- `bfd_fast_detect_ipv4` (Boolean) Address Family
- `bfd_fast_detect_ipv6` (Boolean) Address Family
- `bfd_minimum_interval` (Number) Hello interval
- `bfd_multiplier` (Number) Detect multiplier
- `circuit_type` (String) Configure circuit type for interface
- `csnp_interval` (Number) Set CSNP interval
- `csnp_interval_levels` (Attributes List) Set the CSNP interval only at the supplied level (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--csnp_interval_levels))
- `delay_normalize_interval` (Number) Value in microseconds
- `delay_normalize_offset` (Number) Normalization offset
- `hello_interval` (Number) Set Hello interval in seconds
- `hello_interval_levels` (Attributes List) Set hello-interval for IIHs at this level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--hello_interval_levels))
- `hello_multiplier` (Number) Set multiplier for Hello holding time
- `hello_multiplier_levels` (Attributes List) Set hello-multiplier for one level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--hello_multiplier_levels))
- `hello_padding` (String) Add padding to IS-IS hello packets
- `hello_padding_levels` (Attributes List) Set hello-padding for one level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--hello_padding_levels))
- `hello_password_accept_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies a password will follow
- `hello_password_accepts_levels` (Attributes List) Set hello-password for one level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--hello_password_accepts_levels))
- `hello_password_hmac_md5_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies a password will follow
- `hello_password_hmac_md5_send_only` (Boolean) Do not require authentication of incoming IIHs
- `hello_password_keychain_name` (String) Specifies a Key Chain name will follow
- `hello_password_keychain_send_only` (Boolean) Do not require authentication of incoming IIHs
- `hello_password_levels` (Attributes List) Set hello-password for one level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--hello_password_levels))
- `hello_password_text_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies a password will follow
- `hello_password_text_send_only` (Boolean, Sensitive) Do not require authentication of incoming IIHs
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `link_down_fast_detect` (Boolean) Enable high priority detection
- `lsp_interval` (Number) Set LSP transmission interval
- `lsp_interval_levels` (Attributes List) Set LSP transmission interval one level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--lsp_interval_levels))
- `mesh_group` (Number) Mesh group number
- `mesh_group_blocked` (Boolean) Block LSPs on this interface
- `mpls_ldp_sync` (Boolean) Configure LDP ISIS synchronization
- `mpls_ldp_sync_level` (Number) Set LDP synchronization for one level only
- `override_metrics` (String) Override the configured link metrics
- `point_to_point` (Boolean) Treat active LAN interface as point-to-point
- `priority` (Number) Set priority for Designated Router election
- `priority_levels` (Attributes List) Set priority for one level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--priority_levels))
- `remote_psnp_delay` (Number) Set remote PSNP delay
- `retransmit_interval` (Number) Interval between retransmissions of the same LSP
- `retransmit_interval_levels` (Attributes List) Set retransmit-interval for one level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--retransmit_interval_levels))
- `retransmit_throttle_interval` (Number) Minimum interval betwen retransissions of different LSPs
- `retransmit_throttle_interval_levels` (Attributes List) Set retransmit-throttle-interval for one level only (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--retransmit_throttle_interval_levels))
- `state` (String) Do not establish adjacencies over this interface

### Nested Schema for `csnp_interval_levels`

Read-Only:

- `csnp_interval` (Number) Set CSNP interval
- `level_number` (Number) Set the CSNP interval only at this level

### Nested Schema for `hello_password_accepts_levels`

Read-Only:

- `encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies a password will follow
- `level_number` (Number) Set hello-password for IIHs at this level only


<a id="nestedatt--hello_password_levels"></a>
### Nested Schema for `hello_password_levels`

Read-Only:

- `hmac_md5_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies a password will follow
- `hmac_md5_send_only` (Boolean) Do not require authentication of incoming IIHs
- `keychain_name` (String) Specifies a Key Chain name will follow
- `keychain_send_only` (Boolean) Do not require authentication of incoming IIHs
- `level_number` (Number) Set hello-password for one level only
- `text_encrypted` (String, Sensitive) Specifies a password will follow
- `text_send_only` (Boolean) Do not require authentication of incoming IIHs

### Nested Schema for `lsp_interval_levels`

Read-Only:

- `level_number` (Number) Set LSP transmission interval at this level only
- `lsp_interval` (Number) Set LSP transmission interval

### Nested Schema for `priority_levels`

Read-Only:

- `level_number` (Number) Set priority for this level only
- `priority` (Number) Set priority for Designated Router election

### Nested Schema for `retransmit_interval_levels`

Read-Only:

- `level_number` (Number) Set retransmit-interval for LSPs at this level only
- `retransmit_interval` (Number) Interval between retransmissions of the same LSP

- `level_number` (Number) Set retransmit-throttle-interval at this level only
- `retransmit_throttle_interval` (Number) Minimum interval betwen retransissions of different LSPs
